description:
Create a premium steakhouse website for '100 Cerimónias Steakhouse' following the exact layout structure from the reference design at /home/user/scrape-muu/muusteakhousecompthome/screenshot.png. The website should have a dark, elegant theme with black background, gold/warm accents, and luxurious feel.

Structure to follow (based on MUU Steakhouse layout):

1. HERO SECTION: Full-width hero with a dramatic steak image (use ./8b93502b-3f37-4894-9695-18b59fe1c30e.jpg - brasa viva). Centered logo (use ./a3cfa0aa1472.png). Navigation menu with links: SOBRE NÓS | MENU | ATMOSFERA | A EQUIPA | CONTACTOS

2. ABOUT/PASSION SECTION: Title 'SOMOS UNS APAIXONADOS' (like MUU's style). Text: 'No 100 Cerimónias Steakhouse, a carne é o centro de tudo. Selecionamos cortes premium, trabalhados com rigor, respeito pelo produto e uma obsessão clara pela qualidade. Aqui, cada prato é uma celebração do sabor, da textura e do ponto perfeito.' Add a stylized cow/bull graphic icon similar to MUU's colorful cow.

3. MENU SECTION: Dark background with restaurant atmosphere image behind. Tabbed menu navigation with categories: Entradas | Na Brasa | Acompanhamentos | Sobremesas | Vinhos | Cocktails. Display menu items in a clean list format with item name, description, and price aligned right.

Menu content for ENTRADAS tab:
- Croquetes de Alheira - Croquetes crocantes de alheira tradicional portuguesa - €8,50
- Tacos de Xixinha - Tacos recheados com carne desfiada temperada - €10,50
- Ovos Rotos 100 Cerimónias (signature) - Ovos estrelados sobre batata frita com presunto - €13
- Tártaro de Novilho - Carne de novilho picada à mão, temperada na hora - €15
- Camarão 100 Cerimónias (signature) - Camarão grelhado com alho e ervas aromáticas - €12

Menu content for NA BRASA tab:
- Vazia (250gr) - Maturação de 22 dias - €28
- Picanha (500gr) signature - Corte típico argentino com gordura lateral - €48
- Txuletón (1kg) bestseller - Corte típico basco com osso - €79
- Tomahawk (1kg) signature bestseller - Corte invulgar com osso extenso - €89
- T-Bone (1kg) - Osso em T que separa vazia e lombo - €79
- Tábua Premium 100 Cerimónias (2kg) signature - Carnes para todos os gostos - €172

Menu content for ACOMPANHAMENTOS tab:
- Batata Rústica (veggie) - €4,50
- Salada Mista (veggie) - €4
- Legumes Grelhados na Brasa (veggie) - €4,50
- Arroz de Forno de Enchidos - €4
- Puré de Batata Trufado (veggie) - €7,50

Menu content for SOBREMESAS tab:
- Bola de Gelado 100 Cerimónias - €4
- Surpresa de Maracujá - €10
- Fondant de Doce de Leite (bestseller) - €12
- Brownie de Chocolate - €10

Menu content for VINHOS tab:
Brancos: Vale do Homem Aditivo €20, Contacto Alvarinho €28, Dote Simplesmente €22
Tintos: Zip Unoaked €20, Vale da Aldeia €26, Vallado €28, Loek's Grande Reserva €60

Menu content for COCKTAILS tab:
Assinatura (€12): Lick My Peach, Em Brasa, Special Mojito, Cerimónias Mule
Clássicos (€8): Margarita, Cosmopolitan, Mojito, Caipirinha, Negroni

4. ATMOSFERA SECTION: Title 'ATMOSFERA' centered. Grid of 6 restaurant interior/food photos showing the ambiance. Use images: ./0d3ca745-bfea-410b-969b-7df83d9607af.jpg, ./85045d6c-1f52-42a3-8a59-565b62ec4b13.jpg, ./39e5e286-7685-49e6-893a-385744302fdb.jpg, ./99620f26-b610-42b4-a5bf-d0d7df4b54d9.jpg, ./1277703a-2b54-4bf2-ac50-a3cddc437347.jpg, ./a5e37b97-57ed-4949-8d6c-84ecde77bf38.jpg

5. A EQUIPA SECTION: Title 'A EQUIPA 100 CERIMÓNIAS' centered. Introductory text about the team philosophy. Display 3 team member cards with photos (use food prep images as placeholders: ./1b8daf33-f44a-4004-9a78-9ac0575641d1.jpg for chef). Team members: Head Chef, Sommelier, Gerente - with short descriptions.

6. CONTACTOS/FOOTER SECTION: Restaurant name '100 Cerimónias Steakhouse'. Address: Porto, Portugal. Established 2023. Phone for reservations. Email contact. Social media links (Facebook, Instagram, TripAdvisor icons). Faded logo at bottom.

Design notes: Use elegant serif fonts for headings, clean sans-serif for body. Gold/amber accent color (#D4AF37 or similar) on dark background. Smooth scroll navigation. Hover effects on menu items and images. Mobile responsive.

Make the following updates to improve the website premium feel:

1. REMOVE THE COLORFUL COW GRAPHIC completely from the 'Sobre Nós' section. Replace it with an elegant animated reservation button that links to https://resy.com/cities/porto-portugal/venues/100-cerimonias-steakhouse-premium. The button should have a subtle pulse/glow animation with gold border, text 'RESERVAR MESA' and be simple and elegant.

2. ADD BILINGUAL TOGGLE (PT | EN) in the header navigation. When clicked, all text content should switch between Portuguese and English. Store the language preference.

3. ANIMATE THE LOGO in the hero section - add a subtle elegant entrance animation (fade in with slight scale) and a gentle floating/breathing animation on hover. Add the slogan 'A arte da carne, servida com elegância' underneath the logo with a fade-in animation.

4. UPDATE CONTACT INFORMATION with correct details:
   - Address: Rua de Santo Ildefonso 210, 4000-507 Porto, Portugal
   - Phone: +351 933 156 603
   - Hours: Terça a Domingo | 19h00 – 00h00 (Encerrado à Segunda)
   - Instagram: @100.cerimonias.steakhouse
   - Reservation link: https://resy.com/cities/porto-portugal/venues/100-cerimonias-steakhouse-premium

5. PREMIUM ENHANCEMENTS:
   - Add subtle parallax effect on scroll for hero image
   - Add elegant line separators between sections (thin gold lines)
   - Add smooth reveal animations for menu items as they scroll into view
   - Improve the gallery with a lightbox effect when clicking images
   - Add a subtle grain/texture overlay for that premium steakhouse feel
   - Make the navigation sticky with a blur backdrop effect when scrolling
   - Add elegant hover effects on all interactive elements (scale, glow)
   - Include a 'scroll to top' button that appears when scrolling down
   - Add loading animation on page load (elegant fade in)

6. Keep all the existing fonts (Cormorant Garamond for headings, Montserrat for body) and the gold/amber color scheme on dark background.
